name: BoringJeff
0:
”Alexa, ask Boring Jeff to tell Eve she's talking total BS.”
”Alexa, ask Boring Jeff to check if Will is right.”
”Alexa, ask Boring Jeff to tell Sophie she's wrong.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: boring jeff
Developer Terms of Use
des: Boring Jeff tells people they are wrong. He's just that kind of guy. He's useful to have around when your friends, family, and loved ones are wrong, and need to be told what's what.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
